Question 1
```{r}
library(readxl)
StudentData <- read_excel("Data Sets/StudentData.xlsx")
View(StudentData)

#demo("colors")
help("boxplot")
```

```{r}
boxplot(StudentData$Fbtime~StudentData$Class, 
        names=c("U","G"), 
        col=c("pink","blue"), 
        xlab="Class", 
        ylab="Time", 
        main="Facebook Time vs. Class")
```

Question 2
```{r}

StudentData_trim<-StudentData[-23,]
gender<-as.factor(StudentData_trim$Gender)
plot(StudentData_trim$Fbtime,StudentData_trim$Introvert,
     xlab="FaceBook Time",
     ylab="Introversion",
     main="FB vs. Introversion vs. Gender",
     pch=StudentData_trim$Gender,
     col=c("pink","blue")[gender],
     points(x=120,y=7,pch="O"))
abline(lm(StudentData$Introvert~StudentData$Fbtime),col="orange",lty=1)
abline(lm(StudentData_trim$Introvert~StudentData_trim$Fbtime),col="green",lty=2)
```
